lead_paragraph: Three Coastal Carolina players were dismissed from the team yesterday, one day after they were arrested on drugs and weapons charges. Mario Tynes, Eric Brown Jr. and Ricky Johnson, all freshmen, were arrested Sunday after the police stopped the car they were in and found two guns, three pounds of marijuana and $1,345 in cash, authorities said.
